hero.title: Elevate Your Workflow with SaaSify
hero.description: The all-in-one platform that helps teams collaborate, automate, and deliver exceptional results. Streamline your processes and focus on what matters most.

features.title: Everything You Need to Succeed
features.description: Our comprehensive platform provides all the tools you need to streamline your workflow, boost productivity, and achieve your goals.

automation.description: Automate repetitive tasks and workflows to save time and reduce errors.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Gain valuable insights with real-time data visualization and reporting.

collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
collaboration.description: Work together seamlessly with integrated communication tools.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Keep your data safe with end-to-end encryption and compliance features.

integration.title: Seamless Integration
integration.description: Connect with your favorite tools through our extensive API ecosystem.

support.title: 24/7 Support

howItWorks.title: Simple Process, Powerful Results
howItWorks.description: Get started in minutes and see the difference our platform can make for your business.

step1.title: Create Account
step1.description: Sign up in seconds with just your email. No credit card required to get started.

step2.title: Configure Workspace
step2.description: Customize your workspace to match your team's unique workflow and requirements.

step3.title: Boost Productivity
step3.description: Start using our powerful features to streamline processes and achieve your goals.

testimonials.title: Loved by Teams Worldwide
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. See what our customers have to say about their experience.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that's right for your business. All plans include a 14-day free trial.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small teams and startups.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large organizations with complex needs.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our platform.

questions.question: How does the 14-day free trial work?
questions.answer: Our 14-day free trial gives you full access to all features of your selected plan. No credit card is required to sign up, and you can cancel at any time during the trial period with no obligation.

questions.question: Can I change plans later?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. If you upgrade, the new pricing will be prorated for the remainder of your billing cycle. If you downgrade, the new pricing will take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.

questions.question: Is there a limit to how many users I can add?
questions.answer: The number of users depends on your plan. The Starter plan allows up to 5 team members, the Professional plan allows up to 20, and the Enterprise plan has no limit on team members.

questions.question: Do you offer discounts for nonprofits or educational institutions?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer special pricing for nonprofits, educational institutions, and open-source projects. Please contact our sales team for more information.

questions.question: How secure is my data?
questions.answer: We take security very seriously. All data is encrypted both in transit and at rest. We use industry-standard security practices and regularly undergo security audits. Our platform is compliant with GDPR, CCPA, and other relevant regulations.

questions.question: What kind of support do you offer?
questions.answer: Support varies by plan. All plans include email support, with the Professional plan offering priority email support. The Enterprise plan includes 24/7 phone and email support. We also have an extensive knowledge base and community forum available to all users.

finalCta.title: Ready to Transform Your Workflow?
finalCta.description: Join thousands of satisfied customers who have streamlined their processes and boosted productivity with our platform.
finalCta.footnote: No credit card required. 14-day free trial. Cancel anytime.

footer.about: Streamline your workflow with our all-in-one SaaS platform. Boost productivity and scale your business.
